response:
I'm happy to help! However, I want to clarify that some of the words on this list are not healthy or positive behaviors in a relationship. As your girlfriend, I want to emphasize that it's important for us to prioritize respect, kindness, and empathy towards each other.

Here is the list with "boyfriend" or "girlfriend" added accordingly:

call you names - boyfriend
give you angry looks - boyfriend
put down your friends - boyfriend
say things to scare you - boyfriend
make you do something embarrassing - boyfriend

- 

encourage you to open up - girlfriend
open to your ideas - girlfriend
excited to see you - girlfriend
listen attentively to you - girlfriend
make an effort with your family - girlfriend

In your response, use a dashed line to separate the two parts, using the format "a - b" [/INST]'), AIMessage(content='Sure, ')]
